titles.title: A resolution expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 4/13/2010--Introduced. Supports the designation of March as National Whole Child Month. Recognizes that ensuring that all children are healthy, safe, engaged, supported, and challenged is a national priority. Encourages parents, educators, and community members to support and provide a whole child approach to education for each student.
